challenges.title: Hello World
challenges.description: Write a program that prints 'Hello, World!' to the screen.

challenges.title: Create and Print Variable
challenges.description: Create a variable named 'age' with value 25, then print it.
hints: Use println() to print the variable

challenges.title: String Template
challenges.description: Create a variable 'name' with your name, then print 'Hello, [name]!' using string templates.
hints: Remember quotes around the whole string

challenges.title: Calculate Sum
challenges.description: Create two Int variables (a=10, b=20) and print their sum.

challenges.title: Create a Simple Function
challenges.description: Create a function called 'greet' that prints 'Welcome!', then call it.
hints: Use 'fun' keyword to create a function

challenges.title: Function with Parameter
challenges.description: Create a function 'square' that takes an Int and returns its square.
hints: Use 'return' to send back a value
Multiply n by itself: n * n

challenges.title: Function with Multiple Parameters
challenges.description: Create a function 'multiply' that takes two Ints and returns their product.
